class BtAvrcpOperationController

Detailed Description

BtAvrcpOperationService needs to be instantiated by the MMI. It is the operational class for AVRCP, which enables the MMI programmer to send and receive AVRCP commands over the air. Pre-Condition for sending AVRCP commands is the registration of a controller service record using an implementation of BtAvrcpRegistrationService.

BtRequestState BtAvrcpOperationService::ConnectRequest (   ) 
 

ConnectRequest starts the execution of a Connect Request to a device (target or controller) which needs to be set first by using the GAP profile.

GetRequestState returns the current state of each request being executed.

Implements BtService.

BOOLEAN BtAvrcpOperationService::GetSubunitInfo (  BtAvrcpSubunitInfoParams &  subunit_info  ) 
 

GetSubunitInfo returns the subunit information on the remote connected unit of the page which was requested as last. The return value tells the application programmer whether the information is valid or not. Only if the application programmer executed the SubunitInfoRequest before GetSubunitInfo the returned values can be set right.

Parameters:
subunit_info A return parameter of type BtAvrcpSubunitInfoParams.
Returns:
BOOLEAN - indicating whether the delivered information can be valid.

BOOLEAN BtAvrcpOperationService::GetUnitInfo (  BtAvrcpUnitInfoParams &  unit_info  ) 
 

GetUnitInfo returns the information on the remote connected unit. The return value tells the application programmer whether the information is valid or not. Only if the application programmer executed the UnitInfoRequest before GetUnitInfo the returned values can be set right.

Parameters:
unit_info A return parameter of type BtAvrcpUnitInfoParams.
Returns:
BOOLEAN - indicating whether the delivered information can be valid.

BOOLEAN BtAvrcpOperationService::IsConnected (   )  const
 

IsConnected returns the state of the connection. As each instance of an BtAvrcpOperationService(Impl) represents a connection to a certain device the IsConnected method delivers the state of the certain connection the BtAvrcpOperationService is related to.

BOOLEAN BtAvrcpOperationService::OnMessage (  const Message &  message  )  [protected, virtual]
 

Every message routed to a dispatcher may be treated in OnMessage.

Returns:
TRUE is returned, if the message has been dispatched.

Reimplemented from BtAvrcpService.

void BtAvrcpOperationService::OnPanelPassThrough (  BtAvrcpPanelPassThroughParams  panel_passthrough_params  )  [protected, virtual]
 

called when a Panel Pass Through Indication arrives

OnPanelPassThrough needs to be overwritten by the application programmer. It is called when a controller connects to APOXI as a target and when a PanelPassThroughInd is received. The method itself shall be called in case a panel passthrough command cannot directly executed. In this case the base class responds with BtArNotImplemented

Reimplemented in BtAvrcpProfileOperationService.

void BtAvrcpOperationService::OnRawFrame (  BtAvrcpRawFrameParams  raw_frame_params  )  [protected, virtual]
 

OnRawFrame compare to OnPanelPassThrough

Reimplemented in BtAvrcpProfileOperationService.

BtRequestState BtAvrcpOperationService::OperationRequestResponse (  BtRequestType  request_type,
BtAvrcpResponseType  response
) 
 

Response to RawFrameRequest and PanelPassThroughRequest.

OperationRequestResponse needs to be called in case of an incoming PanelPassThroughRequest (executed by having the callback method OnPanelPassThrough called) or RawFrameRequest (OnRawFrame) in order to answer whether an operation is implemented or not.

Parameters:
request_type BtRqtAvrcpPanelPassThroughRsp or BtRqtAvrcpRawFrameRsp
response BtArNotImplemented, BtArAccepted, BtArRejected, BtArInTransition, BtArImplementedStable, BtArResponseChanged, BtArInterim

BtRequestState BtAvrcpOperationService::PanelPassthroughRequest (  BtAvrcpPanelPassThroughParams  ppt_params  ) 
 

PanelPassthroughRequest executes a full featured PanelPassThroughRequest over the air.

Parameters:
ppt_params An instance of BtAvrcpPanelPassThroughParams. Compare to class documentation.

BtRequestState BtAvrcpOperationService::PanelPassthroughRequest (  BtAvrcpOperation  operation,
BtAvrcpStateFlag  state_flag
) 
 

PanelPassthroughRequest executes a BtAvrcpOperation over the air. Furthermore the application programmer has the possibility to send a certain key state.

Parameters:
operation A BtAvrcpOperation
state_flag Either BtAsfButtonPress or BtAsfButtonRelease

BtRequestState BtAvrcpOperationService::PanelPassthroughRequest (  BtAvrcpOperation  operation  ) 
 

PanelPassThroughRequest executes a BtAvrcpOperation over the air. The key state is key pressed. This is the main operation interface for AVRCP.

Parameters:
operation A BtAvrcpOperation.

BtRequestState BtAvrcpOperationService::RawFrameRequest (  BtAvrcpRawFrameParams  raw_frame_params  ) 
 

RawFrameRequest executes a RawFrame Request.

Parameters:
raw_frame_params An instance of BtAvrcpRawFrameParams. Compare to class documentation

RegisterMessages registers the BtAvrcpOperationServiceMessage which indicates incoming PanelPassThrough and RawFrame indications

Implements BtService.

BtRequestState BtAvrcpOperationService::SubunitInfoRequest (  UINT8  page  ) 
 

subunit info request

SubunitInfoRequest sends a Subunit Info Request over the air. After the SubunitInfoRequest is finished OK, the application programmer can get the subunit information of a remote device by executing the GetSubunitInfo command.

Parameters:
page The page to be read out of the remote device.

BtRequestState BtAvrcpOperationService::UnitInfoRequest (   ) 
 

UnitInfoRequest sends a Unit Info Request over the air. After the UnitInfoRequest is finished OK, the application programmer can get the unit information of a remote device by executing the GetUnitInfo command.

Reimplemented from BtAvrcpService.
